data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: Text of 2nd message is too close to the embed of previous message
data.short_description: When two messages containing a rich embed are sent by the same person, the text of the second message is much closer to the previous message's embed than its own embed
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a message with a rich embed (post a link or use a bot) - Post a second message with a single line of text, and with a rich embed as well - Compare space between text of 2nd message and embeds
